snippet.title: Overboard! Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
CAN YOU GET AWAY WITH MURDER?
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/overboard-switch
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1546920/Overboard
GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/overboard
iOS: https://apps.apple.com/app/overboard/id1557505849
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.InkleLtd.Overboard 

JULY, 1935. A MURDER HAS BEEN COMMITTED aboard the SS Hook, eight hours out from New York.

Only one problem: you did it.

Can you get away with murder?

OVERBOARD! is a highly replayable detective game where you're the one whodunnit, from the multi-award-winning creators of 80 DAYS and Heaven's Vault. 

Lie, cheat, steal, seduce, blackmail, threaten, charm and kill your way to freedom... if you can!
